thread.section_title: PGS Gold & Coin Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PGS Gold & Coin | pgsgoldandcoin.com
thread.title: Puzio Robert
thread.title_full: PGS Gold & Coin reviewed by Puzio Robert

author: Puzio Robert
title: Puzio Robert
text:
Recently stopped at PGS Gold & Coin to purchase some Peace Dollars. The staff is very friendly, attentive and knowledgeable. I was quite at ease dealing with them. I found the pricing (at least for Peace Dollars) was based on current retail & was fair.
I will be stopping in again.
